Please click the link below to access the *overview* vignette, which is rendered as a pdf and therefore cannot be directly viewed through the Github created website. Please ignore the tex error.

```{r, echo = FALSE}
system('R CMD Sweave overview_rnw.Rnw')
system('pdflatex overview_rnw.tex')
```
